data.description: The number of bottom layers in the print. When calculated by the bottom thickness, this value is rounded to a whole number.
data.img_description: This image shows all parts affected by the bottom layers setting.
data.hints:
- Instead of setting a height in millimeters for the bottom layers, you can set a specific number of layers. The resulting height in millimeter will be calculated automatically depending on the layer height set.
- Example: Number of bottom layers 12 * 0.1mm layer height = 1.2mm bottom layer thickness.
